name: Lumin (Elmo La Mantia)
description:
We were used to keeping the monsters away…they only used to come out at night… but one day the nights began getting longer… 

Lumin is a first-person exploration game set within an abandoned sanctuary. You will be tasked with finding an ancient power source for your home, the city of Sundara. Freely explore 3 mysteriously abandoned biodomes, each uniquely themed, containing challenging puzzles and vibrant visuals. Discover hidden logs throughout the levels to unravel the secrets of the past events leading up to the sanctuary’s abandonment.

Lumin is a first-year student game from Team 4-Play, developed in six months by a dedicated eleven-person team.

Controls

Move - WASD 

 Sprint - SHIFT

Jump - SPACE

Crouch - C

Interact - E

Journal - J

Special thanks to Jake Pavey and Elliot Orban for creating various tracks for the game (which also feature in the trailer), and also a special thanks to Caylon La Mantia for contributions towards to the creation of the trailer.
